name: Extraterrestrial Greed
description:
Even though it is stupid and dumb, you go out into the abyss of space for coins. Wow you're stupid

Click anywhere on the screen to move the character. The rest of the game speaks for itself.                  

Oh yeah btw on the settings menu there are these set of options that can completely alter your gameplay experience. No not rtx but cheats and they basically do things like change the cooldown of your dash and the scale of meteorites and character.

Thank you so much for downloading this game if you have and I really hope you enjoy it :)
